messages.content:
Based on the following context, determine a clear, concise role or position for the stakeholder Andrew Forrest in relation to Fortescue.

Previously identified role(s): Mining executive, CEO of Fortescue, Chairman of Fortescue Metals Group Ltd., Philanthropist, co-founder of Minderoo Foundation, Major shareholder, Chairman, Founder of Fortescue, Green energy pioneer, Executive Chairman, Executive Chairman of Fortescue, Founder and major shareholder, Founder of Fortescue Metals Group, Philanthropist and businessman, Businessman, CEO of Fortescue Metals Group, Fortescue Energy's Executive Chairman, Fortescue's CEO, Billionaire, Fortescue's controller, Major shareholder and control of Fortescue, Mining billionaire, founder of Fortescue, Founder and Executive Chairman, Founder and Executive Chair of Fortescue, Rich Lister and early-stage minority investor in Universal Hydrogen, Fortescue's Chairman

Context:
Quote: "No one was injured in the incident and there is no impact to members of the community."
Context: In their role as Fortescue's Chairman, they stated: "No one was injured in the incident and there is no impact to members of the community."
Quote: "Fortescue said the derailment involved multiple wagons but declined to say how many or reveal additional details on the extent of the damage."
Context: In their role as Fortescue's CEO, they stated: "Fortescue said the derailment involved multiple wagons but declined to say how many or reveal additional details on the extent of the damage."
Quote: "Fortescue's executive chairman, Andrew Forrest, has spent the past few years warning about the threat of global warming and more recently lethal humidity."
Context: In their role as Executive Chairman of Fortescue, they stated: "Fortescue's executive chairman, Andrew Forrest, has spent the past few years warning about the threat of global warming and more recently lethal humidity."
Quote: "Plug is a key partner for Andrew Forrest's Fortescue Energy."
Context: In their role as Fortescue Energy's Executive Chairman, they stated: "Plug is a key partner for Andrew Forrest's Fortescue Energy."
Quote: "Fortescue is the nation's biggest hydrogen bull."
Context: In their role as Founder of Fortescue, they stated: "Fortescue is the nation's biggest hydrogen bull."
Quote: "Fortescue owns about 70% of the operation, with the remainder controlled by Taiwan's Formosa."
Context: In their role as Billionaire, Fortescue's controller, they stated: "Fortescue owns about 70% of the operation, with the remainder controlled by Taiwan's Formosa."
Quote: "Whether it's through our first green energy projects, our diversification into the high-grade segment of the iron ore market through Iron Bridge, or expansion of our global footprint with the Belinga iron ore project in Gabon, we remain committed to creating value for all our stakeholders."
Context: In their role as Founder and Executive Chairman, they stated: "Whether it's through our first green energy projects, our diversification into the high-grade segment of the iron ore market through Iron Bridge, or expansion of our global footprint with the Belinga iron ore project in Gabon, we remain committed to creating value for all our stakeholders."
Quote: "The dividend will deliver a $1.2bn payout to the commercial and charitable interests of Andrew and Nicola Forrest."
Context: In their role as Major shareholder, they stated: "The dividend will deliver a $1.2bn payout to the commercial and charitable interests of Andrew and Nicola Forrest."
Quote: "The dividend will deliver a $1.2bn payout to the commercial and charitable interests of Andrew and Nicola Forrest, whose business and philanthropic affairs remain intertwined despite their separation last year."
Context: In their role as Philanthropist and businessman, they stated: "The dividend will deliver a $1.2bn payout to the commercial and charitable interests of Andrew and Nicola Forrest, whose business and philanthropic affairs remain intertwined despite their separation last year."
Quote: "This is a huge milestone and brings us one step closer to green shipping."
Context: In their role as Green energy pioneer, they stated: "This is a huge milestone and brings us one step closer to green shipping."
Quote: "As a family we agreed many years ago to give away the majority of our wealth."
Context: In their role as Philanthropist, co-founder of Minderoo Foundation, they stated: "As a family we agreed many years ago to give away the majority of our wealth."
Quote: "I made it really clear if they don't change that stance, I don't bluff."
Context: In their role as Businessman, CEO of Fortescue Metals Group, they stated: "I made it really clear if they don't change that stance, I don't bluff."
Quote: "There remains significant interest in our green energy projects and the prospect of green hydrogen and its derivatives."
Context: In their role as Rich Lister and early-stage minority investor in Universal Hydrogen, they stated: "There remains significant interest in our green energy projects and the prospect of green hydrogen and its derivatives."
Quote: "I think, if I look back on anything with a semblance of pride, it will be switching off all fossil fuels of this huge industrial hyper-successful company."
Context: In their role as Founder of Fortescue Metals Group, they stated: "I think, if I look back on anything with a semblance of pride, it will be switching off all fossil fuels of this huge industrial hyper-successful company."
Quote: "Forrest has admitted what should have been obvious from the start. Energy users want cheap energy and hydrogen is not cheap."
Context: In their role as Mining billionaire, founder of Fortescue, they stated: "Forrest has admitted what should have been obvious from the start. Energy users want cheap energy and hydrogen is not cheap."
Quote: "We are producing green hydrogen as we speak."
Context: In their role as Mining executive, CEO of Fortescue, they stated: "We are producing green hydrogen as we speak."
Quote: "The latest results come as Fortescue has had to re-evaluate its green energy ambitions, cutting 700 jobs in July."
Context: In their role as Founder and major shareholder, they stated: "The latest results come as Fortescue has had to re-evaluate its green energy ambitions, cutting 700 jobs in July."
Quote: "This is the first of more than one gigawatt of solar infrastructure that we will build before the end of the decade."
Context: In their role as Executive Chairman, they stated: "This is the first of more than one gigawatt of solar infrastructure that we will build before the end of the decade."
Quote: "What we don't do is give up."
Context: In their role as Founder and Executive Chair of Fortescue, they stated: "What we don't do is give up."
Quote: "Fortescue, chaired by billionaire founder Andrew Forrest, aiming to produce its first green metal from Pilbara ores within a year from its $US50m Christmas Creek pilot plant."
Context: In their role as Chairman, they stated: "Fortescue, chaired by billionaire founder Andrew Forrest, aiming to produce its first green metal from Pilbara ores within a year from its $US50m Christmas Creek pilot plant."
Quote: "We re moving rapidly to decarbonize our Pilbara iron ore operations and eliminate our Scope 1 and 2 terrestrial emissions by 2030."
Context: In their role as Chairman of Fortescue Metals Group Ltd., they stated: "We re moving rapidly to decarbonize our Pilbara iron ore operations and eliminate our Scope 1 and 2 terrestrial emissions by 2030."
Quote: "The dividend is worth about $560 million to Andrew and Nicola Forrest, who separated in 2023 and collectively control 36.7 per cent of the miner."
Context: In their role as Major shareholder and control of Fortescue, they stated: "The dividend is worth about $560 million to Andrew and Nicola Forrest, who separated in 2023 and collectively control 36.7 per cent of the miner."

Requirements:
1. Provide a single role or position in 1-5 words maximum
2. Be specific and relevant to Fortescue or its industry
3. Focus on the stakeholder's professional capacity or expertise
4. Use concise, clear terminology
5. Include the entity or organisation the stakeholder is associated with, if the information is available.

Example good responses:
- "Chief Technology Officer of [Institution NAME]"
- "Industry Analyst at [Entity NAME]"
- "Solar Energy Expert"
- "Investment Director for [Entity NAME]"
- "Consumer"

Example bad responses:
- "A highly experienced professional in the field" (too long)
- "Person involved in operations" (too vague)
- "Stakeholder" (too generic)

Output only the role/position, nothing else.
Founder and Executive Chairman of Fortescue
